extendedInfo.description: ** This is a license that removes ads and supports further development **** Buy this app, and it will automatically download free version that is licensed (if you don't have it already) **"Shopping list" is an application that helps you organize, share with others, and manage your shopping or grocery lists using your phone. Easily add new items you need to buy, set quantity, and pick a category.When organizing your products, you can add prices, pictures and barcodes to items you need to buy!In store, just open your list and tick off every item you bought. Depending on your preferences, items are marked as "bought", moved to the end of the list or deleted from list.Synchronize your Shopping list with another person. Let one person enter shopping items on one phone, and see them appear on another one! Coordinated shopping at its peak!If the other person has not installed this app, you can send your list via text message or email.Highlights:* Categories* Instant synchronization between two phones* Barcode scanner* Remembers what you put on list once, reuse it again* Backup and restore your data* Many customizing possibilities* App design for quick manipulationRequired permissions:* SD card access is used to allow you to backup your shopping lists, products and preferences.* Internet access is used for synchronizing with other users.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: My husband and I love this app, as we are both able to update the shopping list from our devices  and it\'s nicely customisable. Minor sync issue was dealt with by the developer speedily and efficiently. Many thanks indeed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I\'m on ver 2.4.9 and love this app. It is one of the few that I\'m willing to pay for the non-ad version. We use this all the time. The sync option is the greatest thing for us to know who has picked up what on the way home from work. I had to use the support email once the response time was 15 min on a Saturday I was hoping for maybe late Monday to get a generic canned email reply. Love this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best shopping list
reviews.comment: Went ahead and purchased the license version to support development since this is easily the best shopping list app I\'ve been able to find. If you want to add extra info and specify every item on your list down to the last detail, this provides the bells and whistles to let you do so. At the same time though, if you just want a basic list or two, this app allows you to have it simple too. Great for getting the list down and going over frequently bought items later.
reviews.author: Nicole Weber

reviews.title: I downloaded it. Nothing happens
reviews.comment: Each screen I came to nothing would happen after pushing on the list or other items. Wasted my money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Very nice app. Like the sync feature, my wife can update the list and I can get items on the way home from work. Works great, def worth the add free version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Ads started to annoy me so paid for the full version. Don\'t mind paying for such a food app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: I haven\'t even used the app for shopping, but had much fun taking pics of items I need and  building my first list. Definitely will be a new favorite, often used app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use.
reviews.comment: This was the easiest app I have ever used
reviews.author: Daniel Scouten

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Really enjoying this app.  The layout could be more intuitive but good all the same. If only I could press go and supermarket would deliver it to my door!  Be great if it were possible to export/import into supermarket website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: User guide please or web address to get it. Very few Sains or Morrisons branded items found using scanner, Waitrose are found. Good could be great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth the money!
reviews.comment: The license only gets rid of adds but it is worth the money to keep this great little app going! Support is excellent, and they welcome ideas! Great combo! Keep it up!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty Good.  As simple or as detailed
reviews.comment: as you  want. Had a VERY difficult time organizing lists though. Don\'t usually mind ads but these r very bad. Went ahead and paid to get rid of them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is by far my favorite shopping list. I also use it as a to-do list :) Highly recommended!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice toy but...
reviews.comment: It dosen\'t serve the purpose what so ever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says in a logical, graphically clear way. Top notch.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I like this appa a lot, also polite, doesn\'t want device ID etc, DHD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty good but it has crashed & reset to original 3 times since I paid for the licence. UPC scans sometimes come up with strange results.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Coupons & tax
reviews.comment: Would be great if you could enter coupon or tax in item detail that would reduce or increase price of item.  Jim S
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Husband and I use it daily
reviews.comment: No more phone tag about who will or won\'t pick up what at the store. Happy to support them with the paid version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Helpful       Dharmesh Master
reviews.comment: Very Nice app working On Galaxy Note
reviews.author: A Google User
